summary.span: 提供当单击 、 或 控件时，显示 的控件的基本功能。

span.span: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a when a , , or control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的抽象基类， ，和，这可以托管直接项或主机下拉容器中的其他项。 is the abstract base class for , , and , which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container. 执行此操作通过设置属性和设置属性。You do this by setting the property to a and setting the property of the . 访问直接通过这些下拉列表项属性。Access these drop-down items directly through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和隐藏控件。The following code example demonstrates how to show and hide controls. param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有与关联，调用创建泛型的下拉列表控件。If no is associated with the , a call to creates a generic drop-down control. > [!NOTE] > 如果下拉列表控件将自动生成的这意味着，将项添加到集合，然后设置到显式的下拉列表控件的属性，你可能会丢失数据。If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何分配控制转移到控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to assign a control to a control's property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef m As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % m, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: m
param.span: 通过引用传递的 ，表示要处理的窗口消息。

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: 值之一，表示要处理的键。

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 处理命令键。

span.span: Processes a command key.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 调用此方法实现的中的项是否集合。The implementation of this method calls the of the if there are items in the collection. 否则，此实现中调用基类实现。Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.

permission.span: 直接调用方和继承类来调用此方法。

span.span: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: .

para.span: 在重写派生类中的方法，该方法重写应返回以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the method override should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生的类将很少，如果有，需要重写此方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

span.span: One of the values that represents the key to process.

summary.span: 处理对话框键。

span.span: Processes a dialog key.

returns.span: 如果键已由该项处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息上、 下、 左、 右、 enter 键，并按空格键以导航下拉列表菜单的层次结构的键预处理过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.

permission.span: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

para.span: 在重写派生类中的方法，重写实现应返回以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 派生的类将很少，如果有，需要重写此方法。

span.span: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

summary.span: 显示与此 关联的 控件。

span.span: Displays the control associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以显示设置的下拉列表控件属性。Use the method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示控制当按下某个按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to show a control when a button is pressed. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
